data.name: On the Hunt
data.detailed_description:
The development of the game took a long pause due to my illness (leukemia). Let's keep in touch, join the community! I'll get better and get it all done!


On the Hunt is a first-person wild animal hunting simulator. A game with a fairly well-developed world of wildlife. Wild animals are very circumspect and careful, hunt down and develop your hunter skill!
Test your new weapon at the shooting range and go hunting for the beast in these beautiful places as soon as possible!

KEY FEATURES:
  • A large number of picturesque locations for hunting, at different times of the year.
  • Decide for yourself: to hunt in sports excitement or meditatively walk around the area.
  • A wide selection of smooth-bore and rifled weapons and cartridges for them.
  • Hunting animals: elk, wild boar, deer, bear, wolf, fox...
  • Upgrade system of experience and ammunition.

    Hunting in various scenic regions is fun and exciting!
    Have a good hunting !!!

data.short_description: Become a top class hunter polish your shooting skill to perfection!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 ( 1GB)
  • Additional Notes: There is a test scene to check compatibility.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 760 (4GB)
  • Additional Notes: There is a test scene to check compatibility.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
